data: The sky from sea-line to sea-line was crusted with stars, a triumphant, cloudless, tropic night-sky beneath which the _Dryad_ rode at her anchor, lifting lazily to the swell flowing up from beyond the great Bahama bank.
Satan: A Romance of the Bahamas
H. De Vere (Henry De Vere) Stacpoole
browsing: literature|browsing: travel & geography|browsing: fiction|category: adventure|category: novels
